call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent failed to offer accommodation

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is John. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hello, I'm calling about a recent transaction on my card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I have a hearing impairment, can you speak clearly?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm sorry, but I can't help with that. Please call our disability services line.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: That's not helpful. I need assistance now.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll make a note of your concern.
